name: Parallels - The Game
description:
After their daughter's death, the lives of Eduard and Eleonore are destroyed.

Their last hope for salvation is a mysterious experiment, which both try to conduct separated from each other.

Parallels is a dark and atmospheric first-person point and click adventure game made with Unity & Playmaker. 

While shooting a short film, we had the idea of photographing the film set and using it as the basis for our first point & click adventure. So the game consists 99% of photos we took on location. It also acts as a prequel to the story of the short film. One of us was the writer/director, the other one ruined the sound.
